Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
